trans-unit.source: Enables sending data to a Web service from within a workflow.
This class cannot be inherited.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity can only be included in a workflow that has a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Eine <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity>-Aktivität kann nur in einem Workflow enthalten sein, der über eine <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity>-Aktivität verfügt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity requires that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.InputActivityNameProperty> is set, and only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> activities located in the same workflow are valid values.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity>-Aktivität erfordert, dass <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.InputActivityNameProperty> festgelegt wird, und nur <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity>-Aktivitäten im gleichen Workflow sind gültige Werte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activity models the return value of a Web service method call.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity>-Aktivität stellt den Rückgabewert eines Webdienst-Methodenaufrufs im Modell dar.

trans-unit.source: It is intended to be paired with a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> that represents the input parameters to a Web service method call.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert soll mit einer <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> kombiniert werden, die die Eingabeparameter für einen Webdienst-Methodenaufruf darstellt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity> activities are used only if the method on the Web service interface contract contains a return value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity>-Aktivitäten werden nur verwendet, wenn die Methode für den Webdienst-Schnittstellenvertrag einen Rückgabewert beinhaltet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> class.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
Gets or sets the name of the preceding <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> class.
The name of the preceding <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> class.
Defines the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> is matched with.
Gets the collection of bindings associated with the out/ref and return value of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity" /> method.
This collection is used to bind the outbound parameters to locations in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Diese Auflistung wird dazu verwendet, die ausgehenden Parameter an Stellen im Workflow zu binden.

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> executes, it extracts the values from the bound locations and delivers these back to the blocked Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Bei Ausführung von <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> werden die Werte aus den gebundenen Stellen extrahiert und an die blockierte Webdienstmethode zurückgesendet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity.ParameterBindings" /> property.
Occurs before the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceOutputActivity" /> sends output to the client.
Defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity sends the output of the Web service invocation.
An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> enumeration value denoting the access level of the property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: Wird zur Kompilierzeit verwendet, um zu überprüfen, ob die Eigenschaften ordnungsgemäß aneinander gebunden sind.

trans-unit.source: Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: Ohne diese Schnittstelle werden diese Informationen direkt von Gettern bzw. Settern für Eigenschaften abgeleitet.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the specified property.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the property whose name is passed as the <paramref name="propertyName" /> parameter.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: Wird zur Kompilierzeit verwendet, um zu überprüfen, ob die Eigenschaften ordnungsgemäß aneinander gebunden sind.
